page.title: 01Mellerstain Estate
page.content: The area is divided between six farms, Blinkbony, Girick, Mellerstain Mill, Mellerstain Home Farm, Smailholm and Spotsmans, the latter few belonging to Mellerstain Estate. All the farms are well served by roads. The River Eden, a tributary of the River Tweed, is the main feature with a steep sided valley, dammed at Mellerstain and Northern Houses to form artificial lakes. Both houses are surrounded by ornamental deciduous woodlands. An additional landscaping feature is the folly, Handy Mandy, two kilometres to the south of Mellerstain House.
